description: script comprised of multiple system enumeration / situational awareness techniques collected over time. If system is a member of a Windows domain. it can also perform limited domain enumeration with the -Domain switch

Cobalt Strike Aggressor script function and alias to perform some rudimentary Windows host enumeration with Beacon built-in commands (i.e. no Powershell. binary calls. or process injection). Additionally. adds a basic enumerate alias for Linux based systems in SSH sessions.

script comprised of multiple system enumeration / situational awareness techniques collected over time. If system is a member of a Windows domain. it can also perform limited domain enumeration with the -Domain switch
